p: The list of plants that have active compounds used as ligands is presented in Table 5. The table shows that citrus fruit have many active compounds, which are potential anti-SARS-CoV-2, including hesperidin, rhoifolin, nobiletin, tangeretin, and chalcone. The table shows that only pectolinarin, epigallocatechin gallate, myristicin, and eugenol have high bioavailability when administered orally.
